original_title: Inventor Crazybrains and the Girl Called Bird
overview: The objects found inside the house seemed of little historical importance - two diaries. But taken together, they form a fantastical little storyâ€¦ and so a filmmaker finds herself caught between fiction and memory, believing in impossibilities.
tagline: We're all on the brink of something...
title: Inventor Crazybrains and the Girl Called Bird
